title: CHURCH / WATERBASINS
description: Waterbasin dialogue for solving the "Move the waterbasins" task.

dialogueTree.title: Water Bowls: "It's awfully silent again, as if so..."
dialogueTree.english: It's awfully silent again, as if someone turned off the entire world outside those walls. Water inside the bowls stands still.
dialogueTree.polish: Znów zapada niesamowita cisza, jakby ktoś wyłączył istniejący za ścianami kościoła świat. Woda w misach pozostaje nieruchoma.
dialogueTree.belarusian: Зноў наступае неверагодная цішыня, нібы хтосьці адключыў існуючы за сценамі касцёла свет. Вада ў місках застаецца нерухома.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Measurements have been marked down..."
links.english: Measurements have been marked down around the bowls, each chalk-drawn line representing a centimetre on the floor.
links.polish: Wokół mis narysowana została podziałka. Każda narysowana kredą na podłodze kreska odpowiada jednemu centymetrowi.
links.belarusian: Вакол міскі была намалявана падзельная шкала. Кожная лінія, намаляваная мелам на падлозе, адпавядае аднаму сантыметру.

links.title: Interfacing: "Oh boy, this is going to be good."
links.english: Oh boy, this is going to be good.

links.title: You: "Move the third bowl from the left t..."
links.english: Move the third bowl from the left two centimetres away.
links.polish: Przesuń trzecią misę od lewej dwa centymetry od siebie.
links.belarusian: Перасуньце трэцюю міску злева на два сантыметры ад сябе.

links.title: Water Bowls: "It moves like a ghost without creat..."
links.english: It moves like a ghost without creating a single trace of sound.
links.polish: Przesuwa się niczym duch, nie wydając ani śladu dźwięku.
links.belarusian: Рухаецца як прывід, не выдаючы ні гуку.

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: "The lead programmer sends you an en..."
links.english: The lead programmer sends you an encouraging thumbs up from across the hall.
links.polish: Główna programistka zachęcającym gestem pokazuje ci z drugiego końca pomieszczenia wyciągnięte w górę kciuki.
links.belarusian: Галоўная праграмістка заахвочваючым жэстам паказвае табе з другога канца пакоя паднятыя ўгару вялікія пальцы.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Time to run back! Or maybe walk, th..."
links.english: Time to run back! Or maybe walk, this *is* a sacred place after all...
links.polish: Czas biec z powrotem! Albo może iść, to w końcu *uświęcone* miejsce...
links.belarusian: Час бегчы назад! Альбо, магчыма, ісці, гэта ў рэшце рэшт *святое* месца...

links.title: Pain Threshold: "*And* your leg still hurts from the..."
links.english: *And* your leg still hurts from the tribunal.
links.polish: No i noga ciągle boli cię po trybunale.
links.belarusian: І нага ўсё яшчэ балiць у цябе пасля трыбунала.

links.title: Logic: "This task is an insult to your ment..."
links.english: This task is an insult to your mental skills.
links.polish: To zadanie jest niczym obelga dla twojego intelektu.
links.belarusian: Гэта заданне — як абраза для твайго інтэлекту.

links.title: You: "Move the fourth bowl from the left..."
links.english: Move the fourth bowl from the left five centimetres to the right.
links.polish: Przesuń czwartą misę od lewej pięć centymetrów w prawo.
links.belarusian: Перасунь чацвёртую місу злева на пяць сантыметраў управа.

links.title: Water Bowls: "Some water spills out of the bowl,..."
links.english: Some water spills out of the bowl, wetting the floor.
links.polish: Z misy wylewa się na podłogę nieco wody.
links.belarusian: З міскі выліваецца на падлогу трохі вады.
